sentences.en: He had been deeply affected by the sudden death of his father-in-law.
sentences.cn: 岳父的猝死使他十分伤心。

sentences.en: He is deeply scornful of politicians.
He was deeply wounded by the treachery of close aides.
sentences.cn: 他被亲密助手的背叛深深地伤害了。

sentences.en: He was nice looking, but I wasn't deeply attracted to him.
sentences.cn: 他长得很帅，可我对他不是很有感觉。

sentences.en: He was the quintessence of all that Eva most deeply loathed.
sentences.cn: 他是伊娃最深恶痛绝的那种人中的典型。

sentences.en: Her lies hurt my father deeply.
sentences.cn: 她的谎言深深地伤害了我父亲。

sentences.en: It has touched me deeply to see how these people live.
sentences.cn: 看到这些人的生活境况，我深受触动。

sentences.en: Robert Tanitch describes the film as "deeply compassionate".
sentences.cn: 罗伯特·塔尼说这部电影“非常感人”。

sentences.en: She breathed deeply, savouring the silence.
sentences.cn: 她深深地吸了口气，细细品味着这宁静。

sentences.en: She sighed deeply and covered her face with her hands.
sentences.cn: 她深深地叹了一口气，用手捂住了自己的脸。

sentences.en: The Chief Constable deeply resented any intrusions into his manor.
sentences.cn: 警察局局长对侵入其辖区的行为深恶痛绝。

sentences.en: Those who listened to him were deeply moved.
sentences.cn: 听众都被他深深打动了。

sentences.en: Voters are deeply distrustful of all politicians.
sentences.cn: 选民对所有的政客都深表怀疑。

sentences.en: We became the best of friends and he influenced me deeply.
sentences.cn: 我们成了最好的朋友，他深深地影响了我。

sentences.en: Wearing fur has become deeply unfashionable.
sentences.cn: 穿毛皮衣物已经相当过时了。

words.tran_cn: 使深化；加深（deepen的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 真诚地，疯狂地，深刻地（野人花园乐队的走红单曲）

trans.tran_cn: 极其，至深处，强烈地，(形容程度)深的
